instruction: Create a detailed plan for hosting a large-scale event.
output: I will create a detailed plan for hosting a large-scale event, starting with setting a budget and timeline. I will then work on logistics such as venue, decorations, caterers, transportation, and guest list. I will also create a marketing plan and create promotional materials, as well as create a website for the event. I will also work on ensuring that all legal, health and safety, and insurance requirements are met.
